DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate performance novel multifocal lens system .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Performance Investigational Contact Lenses Presbyopic Population
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . 2 . Subjects must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 3 . Subjects must 40 70 year age . 4 . Subjects ' spherical equivalent distance refraction must range 3.75 +3.75 eye . 5 . Subjects ' refractive cylinder must less equal 0.75D eye . 6 . Subjects ' ADD power must range +0.75 +2.50D eye . 7 . Subjects ' must best correct visual acuity 20/203 good eye . 8 . Subjects ' wearable pair spectacle . 9 . Subjects ' must adapt soft contact lens wearer eye ( i.e . worn lens minimum 2 day per week least 8 hour per wear day , 1 month duration ) . 10 . Subjects ' must respond positively least symptom `` Presbyopis Symptoms Questionnaire '' already wear presbyopic contact lens correction ( e.g . read spectacle contact lens , multifocal monovision contact lenses , etc. ) . 1 . Currently pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . 2 . Any ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . 3 . Any systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . 4 . Any previous intraocular surgery ( e.g . radial keratotomy , PRK , LASIK , etc . ) 5 . Any grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g . edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) may contraindicate contact lens wear . 6 . Any ocular infection . 7 . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . 8 . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus . 9 . Any infectious disease ( e.g . hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) . 10 . History diabetes . 11 . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 7 day prior study enrollment .
